data.Title: Google Deactivates Russian AdSense Accounts
data.Description: Google has announced the deactivation of all Russia-based AdSense accounts. The company plans to issue July payments in the coming weeks.

data.Title: TikTok Launches Group Chat Feature
data.Description: TikTok is introducing group chats for users over 15 years old, allowing up to 32 people to chat within the app. This feature aims to enhance user engagement and content sharing.

data.Title: Google Search Updates and Tests
data.Description: Google Search is receiving several updates and undergoing testing. These include improved handling of URL parameters, a potential fix for a bug displaying "srsltid" parameters, and experiments with mini knowledge panel cards and a "connections" feature in Knowledge Panels.

data.Title: Google Discover Traffic to Publishers Increases
data.Description: While traffic from Google Web Search and News Search to publishers has declined, Google Discover traffic has seen an upward trend.

data.Title: Google Ads Will Not Pause Keywords in Paused Campaigns
data.Description: Google Ads has confirmed that keywords within paused campaigns or ad groups will not be automatically paused.

data.Title: Bing AI Search Patents Focus on Enhanced Search Experience
data.Description: Microsoft has filed patents related to Bing AI search, aiming to improve informational grounding, create semantic search engine results pages, and enable streaming of chat series within search results.

data.Title: Meta and Universal Music Group Expand Music Licensing Agreement
data.Description: Meta and Universal Music Group (UMG) have expanded their music licensing agreement, allowing users to share UMG's music library across Meta's platforms. The agreement also addresses the use of AI in music.

data.Title: Google's AI Overviews Shift Focus from Reddit to YouTube
data.Description: A recent study reveals that Google's AI search overviews now prioritize YouTube and LinkedIn over Reddit. The overviews also feature shorter content and primarily link to top organic search results.

data.Title: Google's "Hidden Gems" Update Boosts Forum Visibility
data.Description: Google's "hidden gems" update, released in the fall of 2023, has significantly increased the visibility of online forums in search results. While Reddit and Quora experienced substantial surges, other forums also benefited from the update.

data.Title: Ahrefs to Introduce "Patches" Feature for Site Audit Tool
data.Description: Ahrefs is developing a new "Patches" feature for their Site Audit tool to simplify the implementation of SEO audit recommendations. This feature will enable users to address various website issues more efficiently.

data.Title: YouTube Experiments with Merging Shorts and Long-Form Videos
data.Description: YouTube is testing a new feature that merges Shorts and long-form videos into a single feed. This move aims to leverage the popularity of Shorts, which generate 70 billion daily views, to increase engagement with longer content.

data.Title: Bing Outpaced Google in Mobile Search Speed in 2017
data.Description: An internal Google document from 2017, revealed during the DOJ antitrust trials, indicates that Bing Search was faster than Google Search for mobile queries at that time. The document analyzed ten elements of latency.
